Package org.neo4j.bolt.v41.messaging

Class BoltResponseMessageWriterV41

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.bolt.v41.messaging.BoltResponseMessageWriterV41
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, BoltRecordConsumer, BoltResponseMessageWriter
    public class BoltResponseMessageWriterV41
extends Object
implements BoltResponseMessageWriter
    Writer for Bolt request messages to be sent to a Neo4jPack.Packer. All methods need to be synchronized because both bolt worker threads and also bolt keep-alive thread could try to write to the output at the same time.
